urlencoded.description: The products field is required., The products field must be an array.
The products.*.product id field is required., The selected products.*.product id is invalid.
The products.*.quantity field is required., The products.*.quantity field must be an integer., The products.*.quantity field must be at least 1 characters.

request.description: Store a newly created order in the database. This endpoint creates a new order in the system. The request must contain the necessary order data, such as product IDs, quantities.
